vlive.korean: 특별한 경험을 했죠 - 했죠! You experienced something special. - I did! 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: You experienced something special. - I did!

vlive.korean: 대체로 상상보다는 경험에 더 의존하는 편? Rely more on experience, than imagination? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: Rely more on experience, than imagination?

vlive.korean: 또 현지 음식 많이 경험하고 맛보는 걸 저는... I want to experience foods that are in that country... 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 오늘은 일찍..늦지 않게! 왔어요😉
vlive.english: I want to experience foods that are in that country...

vlive.korean: 그런 경험 있습니까? Did you have an experience like that? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
vlive.english: Did you have an experience like that?

vlive.korean: 직접 경험하는... - 뭐라 해야 되지 경험하는 걸... hate experiencing... - How should I say it? Experiencing... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 22 🦊🐿(다시)
vlive.english: hate experiencing... - How should I say it? Experiencing...

examples.korean: The slight risk added zest to the experience. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 약간의 위험성이 그 경험에 묘미를 더해 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The slight risk added zest to the experience. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The experience made an indelible impression on me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 경험은 나에게 잊을 수 없는 각인을 남겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The experience made an indelible impression on me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The experience left her scarred for life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 경험은 그녀의 마음에 평생 지워지지 않는 상처를 남겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The experience left her scarred for life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His mistake was due to youth and inexperience. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 실수는 어리고 경험이 부족해서 발생한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His mistake was due to youth and inexperience. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Reading this essay was an elevating experience. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 산문을 읽는 것은 정신을 고양시키는 경험이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Reading this essay was an elevating experience. Add to Wordbook
